title: Arkansas, The Problem
prompt: A weathered rural clinic or small hospital entrance photographed at golden hour, with warm afternoon light casting long shadows across the brick facade and parking lot; an older pickup truck parked nearby, a single figure visible from behind entering through glass doors; the composition should emphasize the modest, aging architecture and the quiet isolation of the building set against flat Arkansas landscape, conveying both resilience and fragility through documentary-style framing that captures the texture of worn materials and the weight of uncertainty.
